June 10, 1930 D Huddersfield Contest
Huddersfield Band of Hope Union Contest 10 Test Piece Contest Huddersfield Band of Hope Union Contest huddersfield-contest-1
None
The Marriage of Figaro - selection
Greenhead Park, Huddersfield, West Yorkshire, England, UK
Prizes - 1st £17, 2nd £10, 3rd £7, 4th £5, 5th £3. March contest - 1st(£2) Slaithwaite, 2nd(£1) Bentley Colliery. Promoted by Huddersfield Band of Hope Union. 12 bands competed.
Oct. 22, 2013, 11:34 a.m. Dec. 6, 2018, 4:18 p.m.

4 Meltham and Meltham Mills Band Willie Wood
